actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Unemployment Compensation Act of 1974 to provide emergency unemployment compensation to certain individuals who are ineligible for such compensation because they exhausted their rights to State unemployment compensation before there was an extended benefit period in the State.

summary.text: Emergency Unemployment Compensation Extension Act - Provides emergency unemployment compensation to individuals who are ineligible for such compensation because they exhausted their rights to State unemployment compensation before there was an extended benefit period in the State.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Unemployment Compensation Act of 1974 to provide emergency unemployment compensation to certain individuals who are ineligible for such compensation because they exhausted their rights to State unemployment compensation before there was an extended benefit period in the State.
